an4.3:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
an4.3:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an4.3:1.6: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti—
an4.3:1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
an4.3:2.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavati.
an4.3:2.5: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an4.3:2.6: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti—
an4.3:2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatīti.
